description: Carabinieri military police are held on suspicion of crimes that have shocked the city of Piacenza.
title: Italian Carabinieri station in Piacenza shut over torture claims
title_page: Italian Carabinieri station in Piacenza shut over torture claims - BBC News
maintext: The most recent arrival at the barracks, identified in Italian reports as having the initials RB, was recorded complaining to his father about what was going on. According to Italian media, his father told him to move to a department where he would feel more comfortable
